name: Flowers Are Life
description:
CONTROLS:Move with A, W, S, D or your keyboard's arrows
Cut wood by clicking on trees
Access the shop with the Escape key
Sell and Buy by clicking on items in the shop
Plant flowers by clicking on your seeds in the shop

You are playing as Granpa.

He is getting old, you see, but after all these years navigating this world
he has figured out the secret to immortality: Planting flowers!
Only thing tho... Seeds aren't cheap!
And the only way you'll be able to afford them is by selling wood.

But you better hurry up! 

Every day that passes buy is a day that brings Granpa closer to death...

credits: me :D for the art, programming, music and the 'promotional' graphics.

Please note that this is my very first game and it was made in 3 days so it's far from perfect x)

I'm going to keep working on it and add a visually recognizable day/night system with enemies spawning to attack you at night .

Any idea / comment / input is super appreciated :D
